title: My First Sale – A Dream Start for Devi Products
description: Devi Products is proud to announce a special milestone in our journey – the very first sale of our authentic Sri Lankan spices.
content:
We are delighted to announce a significant milestone in our journey – the very first sale of Devi Products.
Our founder officially launched the brand with a mission to deliver premium, authentic Sri Lankan spices to the world. The honor of being our very first customer goes to none other than Mr. Ranjith Premathilake, Chairman of Sanjeewaka Ayurvedic Products (Pvt.) Ltd, the visionary entrepreneur behind the globally renowned Chandanalepa Ayurveda Cosmetics.
The personal handover of our first product was more than just a sale – it was a moment of inspiration and validation. Beginning our journey with the trust of such a respected business leader strengthens our commitment to uphold the values of authenticity, quality, and trust in every product we deliver.
This is only the beginning. Devi Products looks forward to sharing the rich heritage of Sri Lankan spices with the world.

title: Devi Products at the Good Food Show
description: Come visit our booth at the International Good Food Show in London. We will be offering samples and special discounts.
content: Come visit our booth at the International Good Food Show in London. We will be offering samples of our latest products, special event-only discounts, and live cooking demonstrations. Meet the team and experience the world of Devi Products firsthand!

title: Cooking Workshop: The Art of Curry
description: Join our masterclass on creating the perfect Sri Lankan curry. Limited spots available, book now!
content: Join our masterclass on creating the perfect Sri Lankan curry. This hands-on workshop will guide you through the essential techniques and spice blends to create an authentic and delicious curry. Limited spots are available, so book now to avoid disappointment!
